form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Medical Examination of Applicants for United States Visas, NSN 7540-00-139-0058

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/14/2023 PLACE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS BOMBAY FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION (Mo., Day, Yr.) 91078050/10.7.91 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at BOMBAY INDIA NAME (Last in CAPS) (First) (Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX (Mo. Day Yr.) F I certify that on the above date I examined DA SILVA ABEL TOLENTINO M 9.10.07. WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON B 220326 BOMBAY 27.8.91 GENERAL PHYSICAL EXAMINATION I examined specifically for evidence of the conditions listed below. My examination revealed: No apparent defect, disease, or disability The conditions listed below were found (Check boxes that apply) CLASS A CONDITIONS (Give pertinent details under Remarks) CLASS B CONDITIONS Chancroid Hansen's Disease, Infectious Tuberculosis, Active Tuberculosis, Not Active Gonorrhea Lymphogranuloma Venereum Human Immunodeficiency Hansen's Disease, Not Infectious Granuloma Ingulnale Syphills, Infectious Virus (HIV) Infection Other Physical Defect, Disease or Disability: Mental Retardation Previous Occurrence of One or Mental Defect Insanity More Attacks of Insanity Narcotic Drug Addiction Sexual Deviation Psychopathic Personality Chronic Alcoholism EXAMINATION FOR TUBERCULOSIS TUBERCULIN SKIN TEST (See USPHS Instructions) CHEST X-RAY REPORT No reaction Normal Abnormal Not Done Reaction mm Describe findings: Not Done DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DR. F.E.PALIA - DOCTOR'S NAME (Please printh DR. M. TAYABALI DATE READ DATE READ - 7 OCT 1991 10.10.91 SEROLOGIC TEST FOR SYPHILIS SEROLOGIC TEST FOR HIV ANTIBODY Reactive Titer (Confirmatory test performed - Indicate Positive (Confirmed by Western Blot or equally reliable test) treatment under Remarks) Nonreactive Negative Not Done KAHN TEST : NEGATIVE Not Done QTLV (III) ANTIBODIES-NOT DETRICIAS TEST TYPE: TEST TYPE: DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READY OR. (MRS) F. E. PALIA OCT 1991 OR. (MRS) F. E. PALIA jour 1991 OTHER SPECIAL REPORT (S) (When needed) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) REMARKS CLASS - B2 : TUBERCULOSIS, NOT ALINICALLY ACTIVE, NOT INFECTIOUS. Please see reverse side. APPLICANT CERTIFICATION I certify that I understand the purpose of the medical examination and I authorize the required tests to be completed. The information on this form refers to me. x alee Signature Date 7/1-2014 DOCTOR'S NAME (Please type or print clearly) DOCTOR'S SIGNATURE DATE DR. H.R.
